Property.name: AltUpgrades
Property.HelpText: Allow Tikal to drown even after obtaining Knuckles' Air Necklace (counteracting Chaos 0, who can never drown).

Property.name: TikalRadar
Property.HelpText: Enable Tikal's radar in 1P mode (no reaction outside of yellow range).

Property.name: CityEscapeMusic
Property.HelpText: Use the instrumental version of City Escape's BGM when playing as a character other than Sonic.

Property.name: InGameDialogue
Property.HelpText: Disable the radio dialogue in Security Hall, Route 101/280 and Last Episode outside of story mode.

Property.name: ChaoMusic
Property.HelpText: Restore the original BGM assignments for Chao Lobby and Chao Race. Bulletin Board music is used for Chao Transporter.
